thread.title: SHAREHOLDER ALERT: The Law Offices of Vincent Wong Remind Investors of Class Action Involving MasTec, Inc. and a Lead Plaintiff Deadline of July 6, 2015 - MTZ
thread.title_full: SHAREHOLDER ALERT: The Law Offices of Vincent Wong Remind Investors of Class Action Involving MasTec, Inc. and a Lead Plaintiff Deadline of July 6, 2015 - MTZ

title: SHAREHOLDER ALERT: The Law Offices of Vincent Wong Remind Investors of Class Action Involving MasTec, Inc. and a Lead Plaintiff Deadline of July 6, 2015 - MTZ
text:
Content preferences Done 
NEW YORK, July 2, 2015 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Law Offices of Vincent Wong announce that a class action lawsuit has been commenced in the USDC for the Southern District of Florida on behalf of investors who purchased MasTec, Inc. ("MasTec" or the "Company") ( MTZ ) securities between August 12, 2014 and March 17, 2015. 
Click here to learn about the case: http://docs.wongesq.com/MTZ-Info-Request-Form-758 . There is no cost or obligation to you. 
The complaint alleges that the Company made false and/or misleading statements and/or failed to disclose that: (a) certain cost to complete estimates recognized during the third quarter of 2014, currently believed to be between zero to $13 million, should have been recognized during the second quarter of 2014; and (b) MasTec's internal control over financial reporting was ineffective. 
On March 2, 2015, the Company announced it would delay the filing of its Annual Report on Form 10-K for the period ended December 31, 2014. Then on March 17, 2015, the Company announced a further delay in the filing. 
If you suffered a loss in MasTec you have until July 6, 2015 to request that the Court appoint you as lead plaintiff. Your ability to share in any recovery doesn't require that you serve as a lead plaintiff. To obtain additional information, contact Vincent Wong, Esq. either via email vw@wongesq.com , by telephone at 212.425.1140, or visit http://docs.wongesq.com/MTZ-Info-Request-Form-758 . 
Vincent Wong, Esq. is an experienced attorney that has represented investors in securities litigations involving financial fraud and violations of shareholder rights. Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee similar outcomes. Company Legal & Law Matters
